item.description: Desc Text.

item.title: What Is Yoga?
item.description: I’ve decided to pivot from writing about IT to exploring my passion for yoga, which I’ve practiced for nearly a decade. Unlike other sports, yoga has remained a constant in my life. Recently, I discovered Inner Dimension and began a 200-hour yoga teacher training course. I’ll be sharing insights and reflections from this journey. Yoga is more than just physical poses; it’s about harmonizing breath and movement to achieve mental clarity. It offers tools to manage inner turmoil and maintain peace. Join me as I delve deeper into the essence of yoga.

item.title: Optimizing Elasticsearch Monitoring with OpenTelemetry: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Learn how to enhance the monitoring of your Elasticsearch cluster using OpenTelemetry in this comprehensive guide. The article covers essential configurations, such as the Filelog Receiver for logs, Metrics Receiver for Elasticsearch metrics, and Hostmetrics Receiver for instance-level metrics like CPU and memory. Additionally, it explains the integration of Exporters and highlights the significance of OTEL in enabling dynamic indexing for Elasticsearch. With detailed insights and practical tips, this guide empowers you to optimize your Elasticsearch monitoring and effectively analyze log data for improved performance and management.

item.title: Monitoring Kibana with OpenTelemetry Collector: Gathering Logs and Metrics
item.description: Learn how to effectively monitor Kibana using OpenTelemetry Collector in this informative guide. Discover how to gather both logs and metrics data by making specific configurations to Kibana and leveraging the Prometheus exporter. With step-by-step instructions and detailed explanations, you'll gain insights into configuring logs and metrics, setting up receivers, configuring exporters, and creating an OTEL pipeline. Enhance your Kibana monitoring capabilities and optimize your observability with this comprehensive tutorial.

item.title: Integrating StatsD Metrics with Prometheus Using OpenTelemetry
item.description: In this post, we will explore the process of integrating StatsD metrics with Prometheus using OpenTelemetry (Otel). I will shares my firsthand experience and provides a step-by-step guide to help you set up the necessary configurations. If you are looking to receive StatsD metrics and send them to Prometheus for monitoring and analysis, this post is for you.
